title: Tesla Electric Vehicle Sales Decline 8.6% in 2025
description: Tesla Inc. vehicle sales fell 8.6% last year, while fourth-quarter deliveries declined 16% to 418,227 vehicles. The figures drop the Elon Musk-led company well behind China’s BYD Co. in the global ranks of electric-car makers. Ed Ludlow reports on Bloomberg Television. (Source: Bloomberg)
